page.title: 20COUNTRY FAIR
page.content: COUNTRY FAIR EAST KILBRIDE. Calderglen Country Fair is one of the biggest events in EAST KILBRIDE. To get in you have to walk through a sort of forest where there are lots of trees. There are fir and ash trees. All down the sides of the road are stalls. The different stalls had food bottles,raffles,tombola,etc. There was a hot air balloon and you could ride in it. At the back of the fair there was a jumping castle and a ride called an octopus because it had eight arms to swing you. There were dodgems and other shows. There were three stadiums where you could sit. The admission for an adult was Â£1 and for a child, 50p. The main event was the world's strong- est man competition. There was also limbo dancing, pillow fights and other exciting games.
